com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.business.reference

Class FileReferenceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.business.reference.FileReferenceService

  • @Service
public class FileReferenceService
extends Object
    Central point for working with FileReferences. Allows for MultipartFiles to be stored as well as the retrieval/removal of files.
    Since:
    1.3.0
    Author:
    Steven Gentens

        @Transactional
public void changeFileRepository(@NonNull
                                                @NonNull Iterable<FileReference> fileReferences,
                                                @NonNull
                                                @NonNull String repositoryId,
                                                boolean deleteOriginals)
        Changes the repositories of the physical files of a collection of references.
        Parameters:
        fileReferences - collection of references whose descriptors should be updated
        repositoryId - name of the target repository
        deleteOriginals - true if original files should be deleted after move

      • changeFileRepository

        @Transactional
public void changeFileRepository(@NonNull
                                                @NonNull FileReference fileReference,
                                                @NonNull
                                                @NonNull String repositoryId)
        Changes the repository where the actual physical file of a reference is stored. This will update and save the file reference. If the physical file is already in that repository, nothing will be done.

        Note that this wil copy the original file into the new repository, but will not remove the original file when done. Use changeFileRepository(FileReference, String, boolean) if you want to delete the original file.

        Parameters:
        fileReference - to update
        repositoryId - name of the target repository

      • changeFileRepository

        @Transactional
public void changeFileRepository(@NonNull
                                                @NonNull FileReference fileReference,
                                                @NonNull
                                                @NonNull String repositoryId,
                                                boolean removeOriginal)
        Changes the repository where the actual physical file of a reference is stored. This will update and save the file reference. If the physical file is already in that repository, nothing will be done.

        Depending on removeOriginal the original file will be removed after a new one has been uploaded. Only delete original file descriptors if you are sure they are no longer referenced anywhere.

        Parameters:
        fileReference - to update
        repositoryId - name of the target repository

      • delete

        @Transactional
public void delete(FileReference fileReference,
                                  boolean deletePhysicalFile)
        Removes a FileReference. Optionally deletes the physical file if the FileReference has been deleted.
        Parameters:
        fileReference - to remove
        deletePhysicalFile - whether the physical file should be removed
